analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i phyag rgyas dang po nyid du bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya'o /
translated: at the beginning one should empower oneself with the empowerment of all the tathƒÅgatas, the jewel seal.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i phyag rgya ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje rin chen gyi gnas kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa ste des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: The jewel seal of empowerment of all the Tathagatas is the seal of the abode of the jewel of the mandala of the conqueror of the three worlds. With that, the Tathagatas should be empowered.

original: rdo rje rigs kyi dbang bskur ba don du gnyer ba rnams kyis ni byin gyis rlob pa dang / dbang bskur ba la sogs pa rnams kyi rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor du byas la de nas rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgyas bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bya'o //üîΩdang por zhes bya ba ni bzlas brjod dang sgom pa'i dus las dang po yin gyi /

translated: Those who seek the empowerment of the Vajra family should do the yoga of their deity for the sake of consecration, empowerment, etc., and then empower themselves with the jewel seal of the vajra.

original: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor du byed pa las dang po ni ma yin te 'di ni tshogs tha dad pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor du byed pa las dang po ni ma yin te 'di ni tshogs tha dad pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: First means at the beginning of the time of repetition and meditation, but not at the beginning of the yoga of one's deity. This is because it is a separate collection.

original: don gyi dngos grub dang rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub dang rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bkra shis pa'i tshig yin par mtshungs pa nyid yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: don gyi dngos grub dang rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub dang rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bkra shis pa'i tshig yin par mtshungs pa nyid yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: The attainment of the goal, the attainment of magical power, the attainment of the knowledge-holder, and so on, are to be understood as being equivalent in that they are all auspicious expressions.

original: de nas sbyor ba 'di sgrub pa dang dbang bskur ba rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba rnams pa bzhi'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed pa yin no //

translated: Then, this application is the bestowal of the four types of results of the universal monarchs, which are the four initiations.

original: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: da ni de yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub ston te /
analyzed: da ni de yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub ston te /
translated: Now, beginning with ‚ÄúAnd that,‚Äù he teaches the attainment of all happiness and mental happiness.

original: bde ba ni lus kyi bde ba ste dbang po lnga las byung ba de des myong ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba ni lus kyi bde ba ste dbang po lnga las byung ba de des myong ba'o //
translated: Happiness is bodily pleasure, which arises from the five senses, and is experienced by that.

original: yid bde ba ni yid kyis myong ba ste de gnyi ga'i yang dngos grub yin pas bde ba dang yid bde ba'i dngos grub po //
analyzed: yid bde ba ni yid kyis myong ba ste de gnyi ga'i yang dngos grub yin pas bde ba dang yid bde ba'i dngos grub po //
translated: Mental happiness is experienced by the mind. Since it is the attainment of both of those, it is the attainment of happiness and mental happiness.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: 'di ltar rtag tu gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chod pa byas na zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di ltar rtag tu gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chod pa byas na zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus, always making offerings to the Tathagatas with the secret offerings, one should make offerings.

original: gsang ba'i mchod pa ni sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi dang / gsang ba'i mchod @175b ba bcu drug gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa gang yin pa rnams so //
analyzed: gsang ba'i mchod pa ni sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi dang / gsang ba'i mchod @175b ba bcu drug gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa gang yin pa rnams so //
translated: The secret offerings are the four beginning with the dancing girl, and the sixteen secret offerings taught in the Secret Mandala.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa byas na zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces smos pas ni rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa gzung gi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa byas na zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces smos pas ni rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa gzung gi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni ma yin te /
translated: Making offerings to all the Tathagatas means that by mentioning all the Tathagatas, one should understand Vajra Humkara and so on, but not the Tathagatas.

original: de la gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod na bde ba dang yid bde ba 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod na bde ba dang yid bde ba 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one makes offerings to them with the secret offerings, one will accomplish bliss and mental bliss.

original: da ni dngos grub dam pa ston te de yang 'di ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa dang zhes bya ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: da ni dngos grub dam pa ston te de yang 'di ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa dang zhes bya ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: Now, the highest power is taught, and that is like this: one should make offerings to Vajrapani and so on.

original: da ni de la zhes bya ba la sogs pas padma'i rigs su gtogs pa'i dngos grub ston te de yang rnam pa bzhi ste mnyes par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang / padmo'i dngos grub rnams so //
analyzed: da ni de la zhes bya ba la sogs pas padma'i rigs su gtogs pa'i dngos grub ston te de yang rnam pa bzhi ste mnyes par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang / padmo'i dngos grub rnams so //
translated: Now, ‚Äúthere‚Äù and so on teaches the powers belonging to the lotus family, which are of four kinds: pleasing, controlling, protecting, and lotus powers.

original: de las kyang mnyes par bya ba'i sgrub pa dang por bshad de /
analyzed: de las kyang mnyes par bya ba'i sgrub pa dang por bshad de /
translated: Among them, the practice of pleasing is explained first.

original: ji ltar padmo'i 'dod pa bsgoms na zhes bya ba la padma'i 'dod chags yin pas na padmo'i 'dod pa ste bsgrub par bya ba'i snying la padma dmar po bsams la de'i chags pas de mnyes par bya'o ;
analyzed: ji ltar padmo'i 'dod pa bsgoms na zhes bya ba la padma'i 'dod chags yin pas na padmo'i 'dod pa ste bsgrub par bya ba'i snying la padma dmar po bsams la de'i chags pas de mnyes par bya'o ;
translated: ‚ÄúMeditating on the lotus desire‚Äù means that since the lotus is desire, the lotus desire is the object of practice. One should imagine a red lotus in the heart, and by attachment to it, one should please it.

original: / de ltar padmo ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom pa yin te de ltar na sbyor ba 'dis thams can mnyen par byed nus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / de ltar padmo ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom pa yin te de ltar na sbyor ba 'dis thams can mnyen par byed nus par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, one meditates just like the lotus, and in this way, by this yoga, one is able to please all.

original: bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phug rjes su dran par byas na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tu bsgoms la bsgrub par bya ba'i snying du zhugs te de'i ngo bo nyid du byed na sems can thams cad dbang du byed nus par 'gyur ro
analyzed: bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phug rjes su dran par byas na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tu bsgoms la bsgrub par bya ba'i snying du zhugs te de'i ngo bo nyid du byed na sems can thams cad dbang du byed nus par 'gyur ro
translated: If one recollects oneself as the Lord of the World, then, having meditated on oneself as the Lord of the World, and having entered into the heart of the person to be subjugated, if one makes him into one's own nature, one will be able to subjugate all sentient beings.

original: // 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas te byams pas 'gengs par shar phyogs nas brtsams la phyogs bzhi dang mtshams rnams dang / bla 'og gi phyogs bcu char du rim gyis khyab par byas shing bsam pa brtan pas sems can thams cad bde ba dang ldan par gyur ces byams pa bsgoms na de lta bus sems can thams cad bsrung ba dang pa ba dang bskyab nus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: // 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas te byams pas 'gengs par shar phyogs nas brtsams la phyogs bzhi dang mtshams rnams dang / bla 'og gi phyogs bcu char du rim gyis khyab par byas shing bsam pa brtan pas sems can thams cad bde ba dang ldan par gyur ces byams pa bsgoms na de lta bus sems can thams cad bsrung ba dang pa ba dang bskyab nus par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one abides in the samadhi of the Lord of the World and fills with love, beginning in the east, pervading the four directions, the intermediate directions, and the ten directions above and below in sequence, and if one meditates on love with a firm intention, thinking, May all sentient beings come to possess happiness, then by that one will be able to protect, guard, and defend all sentient beings.

original: de la bsrung ba ni mi ma yin rnams so //
analyzed: de la bsrung ba ni mi ma yin rnams so //
translated: Therein, protection is from non-humans.

original: spa ba ni mi rnams las mtshon la sogs pa mi 'bab par byed pa'o //
analyzed: spa ba ni mi rnams las mtshon la sogs pa mi 'bab par byed pa'o //
translated: Protection is the prevention of weapons and so forth from falling on people.

original: bskyab pa ni dgra bo rnams kyi mig lam du gyur pa las kyang mi mthong bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: bskyab pa ni dgra bo rnams kyi mig lam du gyur pa las kyang mi mthong bar byed pa'o //
translated: Rescue is the prevention of even those who have become the object of the eyes of enemies from being seen.

original: da ni padmo'i dngos grub ston te bdag nyid padmo'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas so //üîΩpadmo'i lag par blangs te zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzung ste bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang @176a * //
analyzed: da ni padmo'i dngos grub ston te bdag nyid padmo'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas so // padmo'i lag par blangs te zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzung ste bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang @176a * //
translated: Now, the powers of the lotus family are taught. Having entered into the samadhi of the lotus self, that is, abiding in the samadhi of Lokeshvara,

analyzed: phyug tu bsgoms na de nas 'jig rten dbang phyug tu 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: taking hold of the lotus hand, that is, holding the pledge seal, if one meditates on oneself as Lokeshvara, then one will become accomplished as Lokeshvara.

original: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: da ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub ston te /
analyzed: da ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub ston te /
translated: Now, the powers of the jewel family are taught.

original: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub dang gzi brjid kyi mchog dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang rin po che'i dngos grub rnams so //
analyzed: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub dang gzi brjid kyi mchog dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang rin po che'i dngos grub rnams so //
translated: Thus, the powers of consecration by all the Tathagatas, the supreme splendor, the fulfillment of all wishes, and the jewel powers.

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dbang bskur ba ste ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dbang bskur ba ste ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Therein, the power of consecration by all the Tathagatas is the consecration of all the Tathagatas. Why is it so?

original: nyid kyis dbang bskur ba dbul ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyid kyis dbang bskur ba dbul ba'i phyir ro //

analyzed: 'di skad ston te bdag nyid rdo rje rin chen du bsams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dbang bskur ba dbul ba'o //

original: sngar bsnyen pa byed pa'i tshe dkon mchog gsum dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyam thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la mar me phul bas gzi brjid kyi mchog 'thob par 'gyur ro //

translated: When previously performing the approach, by offering lamps to the Three Jewels, the Buddhas, Bodhisattvas, Sravakas, and Pratyekabuddhas, one will attain the supreme splendor.

translated: One attains the accomplishment of the fulfillment of all wishes in the perfection of generosity to the best of one's ability, which is the meaning of the accomplishment of the wish-fulfilling precious gem.

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bag zan la sogs pa las byas pa'i rin po che'i gzugs brnyan tsam du yang dbul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la rin po che dbul ba dang rin po che bsgoms pas rin po'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //

translated: One should offer to the buddhas and bodhisattvas even just a precious image made of dough, and so on, and offer jewels to the tathƒÅgatas, and through meditating on jewels, one will attain the spiritual power of jewels.

original: dngos grub 'di dag gis zhes bya ba'i ni ji skad gsungs pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: dngos grub 'di dag gis zhes bya ba'i ni ji skad gsungs pa rnams kyis so //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod na zhes bya ba ni tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni ji ltar mngon par 'dod pas dngos grub rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: By worshipping all the tathƒÅgatas means that one will attain the spiritual powers as one wishes, by perfecting the accumulations.

original: de dag gis ni rigs dang rjes su mthun pa'i ngos grub bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag gis ni rigs dang rjes su mthun pa'i ngos grub bstan pa yin no //
translated: These explain the accomplishment of the aspect that is in accord with the family.

original: de ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rtog pa thams cad kyi spyi'i thabs kyis dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te /
analyzed: de ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rtog pa thams cad kyi spyi'i thabs kyis dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te /
translated: Now, from ‚ÄúThen, with a mind like this‚Ä¶‚Äù he teaches the tantra of powers by the general method of all contemplations.

analyzed: bsams pa'i don tshogs chung dus myur du stobs pa'i phyir na thabs zhes bya ba ste shes rab kyis khyad par ro //
translated: It is called ‚Äúmethod‚Äù because it quickly and easily accomplishes the desired aim. It is distinguished by wisdom.

original: de lta bu'i sems kyis dngos grub gang yin pa de ni thabs kyi dngos grub ste de ston pa'i gzhung yin pas na thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do //üîΩ'jig rten 'dul ba ji lta ba //
analyzed: de lta bu'i sems kyis dngos grub gang yin pa de ni thabs kyi dngos grub ste de ston pa'i gzhung yin pas na thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do // 'jig rten 'dul ba ji lta ba //
translated: The power that is such a mind is the power of method. Since it is the text that teaches that, it is the Tantra of the Power of Method.

original: zhes bya ba ni gdul ba'i rnam pa ci dang ci lta @176b bus 'jig rten rnams gdul bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten 'dul ba ji lta ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gdul ba'i rnam pa ci dang ci lta @176b bus 'jig rten rnams gdul bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten 'dul ba ji lta ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúJust as the world is disciplined‚Äù means that the world is disciplined by whatever kind of discipline there is.

original: de dang 'dra bar dngos grub 'dod //
analyzed: de dang 'dra bar dngos grub 'dod //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should desire power in the same way‚Äù meansüîΩthat one should desire power in the same way that the world is disciplined.

original: ces bya ba ni don gyi dngos grub dang rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub dang / rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni don gyi dngos grub dang rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub dang / rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub la sogs pa'o //
translated: The meaning of this is as follows: The powers are the powers of the goal, the powers of magic, the powers of the knowledge holders, and so forth.

original: gang du 'dod ce na rgyud 'dir ro //
analyzed: gang du 'dod ce na rgyud 'dir ro //
translated: Where is it? It is in this Tantra.

original: dngos grub de dag 'thob pa'i thabs kyang gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: dngos grub de dag 'thob pa'i thabs kyang gang zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is the method for attaining those powers?üîΩTherefore,

original: de'i phyir // de yi thabs ni phyag rgya ste //
analyzed: de'i phyir // de yi thabs ni phyag rgya ste //
translated: the method is the seal.

original: zhes bya ba ste phyag rgya ni rnam pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste phyag rgya ni rnam pa bzhi'o //
translated: The seal is of four kinds.

original: thabs de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: thabs de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: What is that method like?üîΩTherefore,

original: de'i phyir // dngos grub chen po kun spyin no //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir // dngos grub chen po kun spyin no // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: it bestows all the great powers.

original: ji ltar na phyag rgya thabs chen po yin zhe na gang gi phyir mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'i 'bras bu gang cung zad yan chad ci bsgrub pa de dag thams cad phyag rgya bzhi'i sbyor bas byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji ltar na phyag rgya thabs chen po yin zhe na gang gi phyir mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'i 'bras bu gang cung zad yan chad ci bsgrub pa de dag thams cad phyag rgya bzhi'i sbyor bas byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: How is the seal the great method? Because whatever is to be accomplished, whatever result is desired, seen or unseen, is all done by the practice of the four seals.

original: da ni phyag rgya'i las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te /
analyzed: da ni phyag rgya'i las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te /

analyzed: phyag rgya rnams kyi thabs yin pas na phyag rgya'i thabs so //

analyzed: des dngos grub 'thob pa'i phyir phyag rgya'i thabs kyi dngos grub po //

analyzed: rgyud gang du ston pa de ni phyag rgya'i thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de ston pa'o //

analyzed: thabs de yang 'jig rten pa rnams dang mi mthun pa yin te /

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /

original: gang gi phyir //üîΩ'jig rten chags dang bral bas 'dul //
analyzed: gang gi phyir // 'jig rten chags dang bral bas 'dul //
translated: Because

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: the world is disciplined by the absence of attachment.

original: chags bral ni yul la rgyab kyis phyogs shing srid pa dang bral ba'o //üîΩchags pa dang bral bas des 'jig rten gang 'dul bar 'gyur ba de ni /
analyzed: chags bral ni yul la rgyab kyis phyogs shing srid pa dang bral ba'o // chags pa dang bral bas des 'jig rten gang 'dul bar 'gyur ba de ni /
translated: The absence of attachment is the turning away from objects and the absence of existence.üîΩThe world is disciplined by the absence of attachment,üîΩby which the world is disciplined.

original: 'ji rten chags dang bral bas 'dul //
analyzed: 'ji rten chags dang bral bas 'dul //
translated: The world is disciplined by the absence of attachment.

original: zhes bya ba ste de'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub mi 'dod do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste de'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub mi 'dod do //
translated: Thus, one does not desire the power of the seals.

original: gal te chags pa dang bral bas 'dul ba zhig yin na yang phyag rgya'i dngos grub ci'i phyir mi 'dod na de'i phyir //
analyzed: gal te chags pa dang bral bas 'dul ba zhig yin na yang phyag rgya'i dngos grub ci'i phyir mi 'dod na de'i phyir //

original: phyag rgya'i dngos grub chags las skyes //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i dngos grub chags las skyes //
translated: The power of the consort arises from attachment.

original: zhes bya bas ston pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya bas ston pa yin no //
translated: This is taught by the verse.

original: 'di sang ston pa yin te phyag rgya chen pa la sogs pa rang gi ngo bo la mchog tu zhen pa dang mchog tu dga' ba dang mchog tu sred pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di sang ston pa yin te phyag rgya chen pa la sogs pa rang gi ngo bo la mchog tu zhen pa dang mchog tu dga' ba dang mchog tu sred pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: The teaching is this: One is successful by the highest attachment, the highest delight, and the highest craving for the nature of the Great Seal, etc.

original: de nyid chen po brjod bya ste //
analyzed: de nyid chen po brjod bya ste //
translated: The great reality is the object of expression.

original: tshig res thams cad bdag yin par //
analyzed: tshig res thams cad bdag yin par //
translated: By each word, all is the self.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o //
translated: And so on, as it has been explained.

original: 'di ni thabs gcig yin te 'di lta ste phyag rgya'i yul la mchog tu zhen pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni thabs gcig yin te 'di lta ste phyag rgya'i yul la mchog tu zhen pa'o //
translated: This is the one method, namely, the highest attachment to the object of the consort.

original: de lta bas na thabs gnyis pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de lta bas na thabs gnyis pa bstan pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the second method is taught:

original: de yi thabs ni bsgom pa ste //
analyzed: de yi thabs ni bsgom pa ste //
translated: The method is meditation.

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is taught by the verse.

original: gang gi phyir gang gi gzugs su bdag nyid zhen par bsgoms na dngos grub kyi mchog tu @177a * //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gang gi gzugs su bdag nyid zhen par bsgoms na dngos grub kyi mchog tu @177a * //
translated: Because of what, and in what form should one meditate on the self as attached, in order to attain the supreme power?

original: 'gyur zhes pa ste thabs kyi mchog tu gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: 'gyur zhes pa ste thabs kyi mchog tu gyur pa yin no //

original: de yang gang gi phyir sgom pa'i rab kyi mthar phyin pa las don thams cad grub par gyur te de bas na phyag rgya rnams la zhen pa dang / bdag de'i tshul du bsgom pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang gang gi phyir sgom pa'i rab kyi mthar phyin pa las don thams cad grub par gyur te de bas na phyag rgya rnams la zhen pa dang / bdag de'i tshul du bsgom pa yin no //
translated: And because of that, all goals are accomplished by the perfection of the best meditation, therefore one should meditate on the self in the manner of attachment to the seals.

original: de ltar phyag rgya'i thabs kyi dngos grub bstan nas da ni sngags kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te /
analyzed: de ltar phyag rgya'i thabs kyi dngos grub bstan nas da ni sngags kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te /
translated: Thus, having taught the power of the seal method, now the tantra of the power of the mantra method is taught.

original: sngags rnams kyi thabs gang yin pa de ni sngags kyi thabs te sngags kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud gang du ston pa de ni sngags kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do //
analyzed: sngags rnams kyi thabs gang yin pa de ni sngags kyi thabs te sngags kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud gang du ston pa de ni sngags kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do //
translated: That which is the method of the mantras is the mantra method. The tantra in which the power of the mantra method is taught is the tantra of the power of the mantra method.

original: 'jig rten rnams mang du nyon mongs su zin kyang dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ba ci'i phyir zhe na de'i phyir /
analyzed: 'jig rten rnams mang du nyon mongs su zin kyang dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ba ci'i phyir zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: Even though worldly people are very much afflicted, why is it that they do not attain power?

original: bden las 'jig rten 'di nyams pas //
analyzed: bden las 'jig rten 'di nyams pas //
translated: Because of the degeneration of this world from the truth,

original: sngags kyi dngos grub thob mi 'gyur //
analyzed: sngags kyi dngos grub thob mi 'gyur //

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te ma mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te ma mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that they do not see it.

original: de yang gang gi phyir rdzogs ldan gyi dus na ni bden pa bsrungs pa tsam gyis skye bo phal pa rnams kyis kyang mngon par 'dod pa'i don rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes grag go //
analyzed: de yang gang gi phyir rdzogs ldan gyi dus na ni bden pa bsrungs pa tsam gyis skye bo phal pa rnams kyis kyang mngon par 'dod pa'i don rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes grag go //
translated: Moreover, it is said that in the age of completeness, by merely maintaining the truth, even ordinary people will accomplish their desired goals.

original: dus deng sang gi sngags pa ni mang du smra ba dang spros pa mngon par dga' ba yin pas shin tu nyon mongs su zin kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dus deng sang gi sngags pa ni mang du smra ba dang spros pa mngon par dga' ba yin pas shin tu nyon mongs su zin kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But nowadays, mantra practitioners are very much afflicted because they delight in much talk and conceptual elaboration, and so they do not attain [power].

original: de ltar sngags 'grub par bya ba'i thabs ci zhig yod ce na de'i phyir //
analyzed: de ltar sngags 'grub par bya ba'i thabs ci zhig yod ce na de'i phyir //

original: spros pa med pa'i thabs kyis ni ;
analyzed: spros pa med pa'i thabs kyis ni ;
translated: By the method of non-conceptualization,

original: / dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur //
analyzed: / dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur //

original: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs so //

analyzed: spros pa med pa'i thabs ni mi smra ba ste ji ltar 'jig rten pa dag / mi sma don du sgrub byed yin //

original: zhes zer ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes zer ba lta bu'o //

analyzed: des na 'dir sngags grub pa'i thabs ni mi smra ba yin par bstan to //

original: da ni rig pa'i thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te /
analyzed: da ni rig pa'i thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te /
translated: Now, the Tantra of the Method of Knowledge for Attaining Powers is taught.

original: rig pa rnams kyi thabs yin pas na rig pa'i thabs te thabs gang gis rig pa'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ba de ston par byed pa'i rgyu yin pas na rig pa'i thabs ki ngos grub kyi rgyud do //
analyzed: rig pa rnams kyi thabs yin pas na rig pa'i thabs te thabs gang gis rig pa'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ba de ston par byed pa'i rgyu yin pas na rig pa'i thabs ki ngos grub kyi rgyud do //
translated: Since it is the method of knowledge, it is the method of knowledge. Since it is the cause for demonstrating by what method the powers of knowledge are attained, it is the Tantra of the Method of Knowledge for Attaining Powers.

original: gang gi phyir 'jig rten 'di na 'bad pa dang ldan du zin kyang rig pa rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'jig rten 'di na 'bad pa dang ldan du zin kyang rig pa rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur ba ni /
translated: Because in this world, even if one strives, the powers of knowledge are not accomplished.

original: ma rig mngon chags 'di la ni //
analyzed: ma rig mngon chags 'di la ni //
translated: This is due to the manifest attachment to ignorance.

original: zhes bya ba ste 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni tshig gi ltag ma'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni tshig gi ltag ma'o //

original: de bas na de la /
analyzed: de bas na de la /
translated: Therefore,

original: rig pa'i dngos grub yod min te //
analyzed: rig pa'i dngos grub yod min te //
translated: there is no spiritual power for one who is ignorant.

original: zhes bya ba la ma rig pa ni mi shes pa ste rmongs pa yin la rmongs pa'i yid kyis ni thabs med pa'i phyir dngos grub @177b thob par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la ma rig pa ni mi shes pa ste rmongs pa yin la rmongs pa'i yid kyis ni thabs med pa'i phyir dngos grub @177b thob par ga la 'gyur /

original: de ltar na rig pa'i dngos grub thob pa'i thabs gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na rig pa'i dngos grub thob pa'i thabs gang zhig yin zhe na /

original: de yi thabs ni rgya che bas //
analyzed: de yi thabs ni rgya che bas //

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te rgya che ba ni rnam par dben pa'i bstan pa de ni rtog pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos pas na don dam pa can no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te rgya che ba ni rnam par dben pa'i bstan pa de ni rtog pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos pas na don dam pa can no //

original: kun rdzob tu ni rnam par rtog pa tsam la rag las pa yin no //
analyzed: kun rdzob tu ni rnam par rtog pa tsam la rag las pa yin no //

original: de bas na /üîΩyang dag pa'am yang dag min //
analyzed: de bas na / yang dag pa'am yang dag min //
translated: Therefore,

original: shin tu bsgom pa gang dag yin //
analyzed: shin tu bsgom pa gang dag yin //
translated: Whatever is well-contemplated or not well-contemplated,

original: sgom pa'i stobs ni rdzogs gyur na /
analyzed: sgom pa'i stobs ni rdzogs gyur na /
translated: When the power of contemplation is perfected,

original: de dang de bzhin snang bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de dang de bzhin snang bar 'gyur //

original: zhes bya ba lta bu ste de ltar na rgya che ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba lta bu ste de ltar na rgya che ba ni /

original: dngos grub kun gyi mchog 'thob bo //
analyzed: dngos grub kun gyi mchog 'thob bo //
translated: One attains the supreme of all powers.

original: zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: This is the teaching.

analyzed: de ltar rtog pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi dngos grub rdzogs par mdzad nas / da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rtog pa thams kyi bsod rnams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te rtog pa thams cad kyi spyir bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi thabs zhes rgyud las bstan pa de ni rtog pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi
translated: Having thus completed the means of achieving all powers of the ma·πá·∏çala,

analyzed: dngos grub kyi rgyud do // de las kyang dang por mchod pa rnam pa bzhi //
translated: now, from ‚ÄúThen, ‚Äù etc., he teaches the tantra of the means of achieving merit for all ma·πá·∏çalas. The means of achieving merit for all ma·πá·∏çalas in general, as taught in the tantra, is the tantra of the means of achieving merit for all ma·πá·∏çalas.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas snying po thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas snying po thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te /

analyzed: mchod pa rnam bzhi byas na ni //

analyzed: bsod rnams chen po 'thob 'gyur te //

analyzed: bsod nams med kyang sangs rgyas mchod //

analyzed: 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med // ces bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
translated: There is no doubt about this.

analyzed: da ni dam tshig gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyag rgya'i bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te /

analyzed: phyag rgya rnams kyi bsod nams yin pas na phyag rgya'i bsod nams so ;

analyzed: bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te //

analyzed: zhes bya ba la phyag rgya rnams kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba bsrungs pa @178a * //

analyzed: las bsod nams chen po 'thob par 'gyur pa'o //
translated: From that, one will attain great merit.üîΩEven without merit,

analyzed: bsod nams med kyang zhes bya ba ni skye ba gzhan dag tu bsod nams ma byas su zin kyang /

analyzed: da ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngags kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te /

analyzed: sngags rnams kyi bsod nams yin pas na sngags kyi bsod nams so //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi bsod nams de yin te /
translated: This is the merit of mantra.

analyzed: bsod nams med kyang myur bar ni //

translated: This is the merit of the gift of the holy Dharma. Even if one has not previously performed meritorious actions in other lives,

analyzed: dam pa'i chos sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyis myur du dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ro //

original: da ni bsod nams zhes bya ba la sogs pas rig pa'i bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te rig pa rnams kyi bsod nams yin pas na rig pa'i bsod nams so //
analyzed: da ni bsod nams zhes bya ba la sogs pas rig pa'i bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ston te rig pa rnams kyi bsod nams yin pas na rig pa'i bsod nams so //

original: yid kyi 'dod pa'i cho ga yis //

translated: If that sound which impels it becomes a repetition, it places its meaning in one's heart, and if that meaning of the meditation becomes a meditation of whatever and however the mind is equipoised, then whatever is desired by the mind

analyzed: da ni phyag rgya 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyus ton te /
translated: Now, the Tantra of the Intuition of the Origin of the Seals is taught by the cause of the origin of the seals.

translated: The Tantra of the Intuition of the Origin of the Seals is that in which the origin of the seals is taught by the cause of the origin of the seals.
